title: Is it just me?
body:
Is it just me or has anyone else been bugsplatting more than normal today?
Oh and average ping per game has been like 160 and my internet connection and speed are perfectly fine.

replies.body: In general if you ever ask yourself if something is just you, it's not!  Bugsplats can happen for a variety of reasons though, and usually a driver or game file issue.  I recommend using our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to tune up your PC and make sure everything is in order.  If you are also having a connection issue, you can run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) for an overview to see if anything is going wrong.  Let me know if you have any questions!

It's not only you. Are you a Windows 10 user who got a recent W10 Anniversary update? Please have a look at these threads:
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/X6sPFPu8-fps-drops-and-crashes-after-the-windows-10-anniversary-update
